## Anchor.download property

Prompts the user to save the linked URL. See [&lt;a&gt; element](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a) for more information.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
download: string;
```

## Remarks

HTML Attribute: download
